segments.text: Hi , Bob ! How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've come to tell you I'm going to the concert this evening.Will you come with me ? I've two complimentary tickets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With the greatest pleasure.Where is the concert this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be held at the Music Hall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a piano recital . I'm fond of piano , you know .
segments.speaker: S2
